messages.title: Ready to serve
messages.content: David Reeves on the family smallholding. He is passionate about local, sustainable food.

issues.environment: David Reeves is passionate about local, sustainable food.

leaflet.personalStatement: My desire to serve is motivated by the same reasons I became a school governor, why I work for a university, why I volunteered to join the territorial Army and serve with the 1st battalion, which led to my serving in Iraq in 2001.

politicalExperience.role: School governor, University employee, Territorial Army volunteer
politicalExperience.achievements: Served with the 1st battalion in Iraq in 2001.

contactInformation.address: Labour Hall, Crab Lane, Biggleswade, Bedfordshire. SG18 0LN

quotes.text: Living in Bedfordshire I understand the local issues and concerns for safer communities, more activities for young people and an end to rural poverty. My focus will be on excelling as a Constituency MP putting local issues first.
